long_description: The prAna Paros Bikini Top gives you higher coverage in front for a sportier look and a feeling of confidence as you swim. Fully lined bikini top offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Contrast-color shoulder straps and bottom band are each fully adjustable for complete support. PrAna Paros bikini top has removable cups with side-seam entry.
short_description: The prAna Paros Bikini Top gives you higher coverage in front for a sportier look and a feeling of confidence as you swim.
